openstack_lb_l7rule_v2.description: Manages a V2 l7rule resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.

tenant_id.description: Required for admins. The UUID of the tenant who owns

description.description: Human-readable description for the L7 Rule.

type.description: The L7 Rule type - can either be COOKIE, FILE\_TYPE, HEADER,

compare_type.description: The comparison type for the L7 rule - can either be

l7policy_id.description: The ID of the L7 Policy to query. Changing this creates a new

value.description: The value to use for the comparison. For example, the file type to

key.description: The key to use for the comparison. For example, the name of the cookie to

invert.description: When true the logic of the rule is inverted. For example, with invert

admin_state_up.description: The administrative state of the L7 Rule.
